thread.section_title: GogglesNMore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GogglesNMore | gogglesnmore.com
thread.title: Suzanne Phillips

author: Suzanne Phillips
title: Suzanne Phillips
text:
Two of my grandchildren have serious vision problems. Swimming has been scary for them as they clearly can't see without their glasses.
Finding affordable prescription goggles for them was wonderful! they are just back from a trip to Florida and a hotel with a pool. They spent hours in the pool and swam, something that one of them couldn't do before at all. I'm sure that swimming lessons this summer will be much more successful! The ordering process is precise, and they arrived earlier than expected. Thank you!
